text: Do you want to start the setup process?

Current choices: \\n\\n 1. Choose whether characters live (ahistorical/historical) \\n  2. Is Empty Land occupied by looters? \\n 3. Dealing with Nanman \\n 4. Lu Bu on Field \\n 5. Sun Ce on Field \\n 6. Total War Mode
Historical has Wu Anguo and Hua Xiong die.
This just gives all abandoned land to the looters.
How would you like to deal with the Nanman?
Option 1: Left Alone. Option 2, the Nanman will be split between Meng Huo, Lady Zhurong, Shamoke, Mulu, and Wutugu. Option 3 place all under one faction. Option 4, they are destroyed.

This crashes for some users, run a test save to DZ's death, and see if this crashes there, if it does, please hit Disable here. (For future reference if you want to ignore all other options, then just do not start the setup process.)
This places Lu Bu's faction on the field to be around, moving several characters to that faction, but also preventing the Diaochan event from popping.
This places Sun Ce's faction on the field, which prevents some events from popping.
Would you like to enable Total War mode?

Total War mode ensures you are at war with EVERY faction that you have met and meet. All war declaration are done either at end of turn or when meeting a new faction.\\n\\n [[col:red]]It is unknown if the mode allows you to get the achievement. This mode cannot be turned off. [[/col]]
